data.name: AcademicExam
data.value: Two periodical exams will be held annually: (a) First temporal (b) Second temp. Weekly and other examinations will be held in 'Jami'ah' prescribed rules. There should be 80% presence in the examination. Can not attend the examination without the entrance test. Must be present at the examination for 10 minutes before the start of the test. Any disciplinary action may be taken including the expulsion for irregularities in the examination. Conducting mischief in the examination would be considered inadequate. If no one fails, then the next category will not be passed. If the student fails to apologize to the absence of the examination, the student will be expelled.

data.name: GalleryDetails
data.value: Jami'ah's education course is divided into 4 levels Ibtaydayi or primary = 5 years Mutwasasitah or secondary = 5 years Chanubia or Higher Secondary = 2 years Fazilat (dora) or higher = 3 years

data.name: JamiyahLifeDetails
data.value: Studying in the light of its own syllabus determined in the form of advanced syllabus of local and foreign institutions. Directed by a handful of skilled, experienced, hardworking and dedicated teachers from various universities and universities of the country and abroad. If you are resident then always supervised by the teachers. A daily meal of 3 'daily' food as well as vegetarian and vegetarian food. Along with attaining full proficiency in Arabic and English language, there is also a chance to gain profound knowledge on the Qur'an and hadeeth. Open playground for healthy living and bodybuilding. Arsenic free pure water system through deep tube wells. Full power supply Computer training arrangements for students passed in the specified classes. Library rich in Bengali, English and Arabic books. The arrangement of 'Supervisory Study Program' as an alternative to class-next coaching. Operation of co-curriculum for the development of in-depth intellectuals. Arrange separate training for communication and lecturing skills in Arabic and English. Every year Jami'ah's academic calendar will be prepared and compiled by making a lesson plan. Healthy, beautiful and quality residential accommodation. Quran system of purely Quran and Hufaz Special care for the closing, JDC, Dakhil, Alim examination Present lectures and debate competition organized. Separate caretaker for unskilled students Prevalent politics free environment. Regular sports, cultural activities and education system. The primary treatment system for all students.

data.name: OurMadrasha
data.value: 'Shaykh Abdur Razzaq bin Yusuf' 'To spread the teachings of Quran and Saheeh hadeeth on the soil of Bangladesh on 24th August 2013, in the Rupganj, Narayanganj, and in February 2016, in Rajshahi,' Al-Jami'ah as-Salafiyah ', two simultaneous standard Islamic teachings The organization was established. Falilahil Hamd

data.name: OurSuccess
data.value: Within a year of the establishment of Jami'ah Salafiyah, with the help of the great God, we have been able to construct residential buildings of three-storeyed students, which have 10 rooms with 18/20 feet below the floor. And 4 rooms of 15/20 feet brick walls have been built for the students. Falilahil Hamd At present, there are 118 students, 10 teachers, four employees and 31 students, 5 teachers and 1 staff in the department of students in this organization. In the first year of his establishment, Jami'ah Salafiyya achieved 100% success in achieving 100% A Plus in the closing examination of the 5th grade. Presently Darshan Bukhari open to everyone in this organization is being held regularly for every month. Falilahil Hamd

data.name: WelcomeDetails
data.value:
As Salamu Alaikum Praise be to Allah alone. Darud and Salam should be distributed to the Prophet (ﷺ). The first commandment of Allah is "read". Welcome to our official web site.
Honorable readers! You are aware that since August 2013, Shaykh Abdur Razzaq bin Yusuf has managed to establish Al-Jami'ah as Salafiyyah for the purpose of preparing algebraic scholars in harmony with the Holy Quran and Chhih Hadeeth as well as modern education. Within a year of the establishment of Jami'ah Salafiyah, with the help of the great God, we have been able to construct residential buildings of three-storeyed students, which have 10 rooms with 18/20 feet below the floor. And 4 rooms of 15/20 feet brick walls have been built for the students. Falilahil Hamd At present, there are 118 students, 10 teachers, four employees and 31 students, 5 teachers and 1 staff in the department of students in this organization. In the first year of his establishment, Jami'ah Salafiah achieved the 100% A Plus success in the closing examination of the 5th grade in 2014. Presently Darshan Bukhari open to everyone in this organization is being held regularly for every month. Falilahil Hamd Current cost: For your reference, it is being informed that at present, the salary and salary of teachers and employees is Rs 1,468,000 per month. And the cost of eating some poor boys, including eight orphans, costs around 60,000 rupees per month. Future plan: It is very important to take some of our work steps for the organization's needs. That's why we want to put things in a hurry, A 1-5-storey residential residential building. The cost of construction of 1st floor is approximately 40 lakhs. 2- Construction of residential building of a 5th floor building with two units. 3- Construction of a 5-storey mosque with nine thousand square feet. The construction of the first floor will cost around one and a half million. 4- Establishment of a quality libraries and laboratories.
Expand your donation arm like this in the past to reach its target educational institution. InshaAllah Allah will give you a better reward.
